Radeon GPU could be faster with slow CPU https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JLEIJhunaW8 
being sold in Czech Republic
https://linustechtips.com/topic/1315736-powercolor-6700xt-being-sold-in-the-czech-republic-at-1250-hash-rate-of-50mhs-is-on-par-with-a-3080-while-consuming-as-much-power-as-a-3060/ 
But the new CMP card is out BUY THAT https://videocardz.com/newz/nvidia-cmp-30hx-crypto-mining-processor-goes-on-sale  

TIKTRAK
TikTok, other Chinese app developers looking to bypass iOS anti-tracking feature
https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2021/03/chinas-tech-giants-test-way-around-apples-new-privacy-rules/ 
elsewhere, can no longer opt out of personalized ads
https://www.vox.com/recode/22334086/tiktok-privacy-policy-personalized-ads
France rules the feature is fine https://techcrunch.com/2021/03/17/frances-competition-authority-declines-to-block-apples-opt-in-consent-for-ios-app-tracking/
https://www.imore.com/france-antitrust-probe-will-examine-application-ios-14-tracking-changes
